用NER获取Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows中的人名，地名，组织¶

一开始对chunk,nltk.tree这两个资料结构以及get_continuous_chunk()这个函数很摸不着头脑，在此推荐两篇文章
Complete guide to build your own Named Entity Recognizer with Python
Source code for nltk.tree

In [2]:
import nltk
from nltk.tokenize import sent_tokenize,word_tokenize
from nltk.tokenize import TreebankWordTokenizer
from nltk.tag import pos_tag
from nltk import ne_chunk,Tree
nltk.download('punkt')
nltk.download('averaged_perceptron_tagger')
nltk.download('maxent_ne_chunker')
nltk.download('words')

Out[2]:

In [3]:
f = open("./HarryPotter.txt",'r',encoding='UTF-8')
ex = f.readlines()
f.close()
len(ex)
Out[3]:
6589
In [4]:
strEx = " ".join(str(x) for x in ex)
In [5]:
def preprocess(sent):
    sent = nltk.word_tokenize(sent)
    sent = nltk.pos_tag(sent)
    return sent
In [6]:
sent = preprocess(strEx)
#sent
In [7]:
grammer = 'NP:{<DT>?<JJ>*<NN>}'
cp = nltk.RegexpParser(grammer)
cs = cp.parse(sent)
print(cs)
#cs.draw()

In [8]:
NER = ne_chunk(sent,binary=False)
type(NER)
Out[8]:
nltk.tree.Tree
In [9]:
#print(NER)
In [10]:
def get_continuous_chunks(text,label):
    chunked = ne_chunk(pos_tag(word_tokenize(text)))
    prev = None
    continuous_chunk = []
    current_chunk = []
    
    for subtree in chunked:
        if(type(subtree) == Tree and subtree.label() == label):
            current_chunk.append(" ".join([token for token,pos in subtree.leaves()]))
        elif current_chunk:
            named_entity = " ".join(current_chunk)
            if(named_entity not in continuous_chunk):
                continuous_chunk.append(named_entity)
                current_chunk = []
        else:
            continue
    return continuous_chunk

很惊喜能识别出Azkaban，但混入很多人名让人不解。

In [11]:
get_continuous_chunks(strEx,'GPE')
Out[11]:
['Severus',
 'Snape',
 'Dawlish',
 'Auror',
 'Dawlish Yaxley',
 'Dawlish Snape',
 'Again',
 'Voldemort',
 'Malfoy',
 'Dragon',
 'Malfoys',
 'Malfoy Bellatrix',
 'Bellatrix',
 'Bellatrix Narcissa',
 'Malfoys Narcissa',

出现了很多奇怪的人名'Voldemort Lucius', 'Malfoy Voldemort','Harry Hedwig'等等

In [13]:
get_continuous_chunks(strEx,'ORGANIZATION')

 'Elder Wand Gryffindor Tower',
 'House Professor Longbottom',
 'Albus',
 'Christmas Peeves',
 'Slytherin Gryffindor']

看到能识别出组织'phoenix'真的让人心情澎湃，但是还是有好多噪音，把很多人名识别成组织名，识别错误的几率太大。对小说NER分析还是非常有必要自建语料库

In [ ]:
